3 rois::rois ()
4 {
5  // read parameters
6  int queue_size;
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
8  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/duplicates", duplicates, false);
9 
10  // get rois from incoming event messages
11  roi_subscriber = nh.subscribe("bridge/events/roi", queue_size, &rois::roi_callback, this);
12 
13  // publish new rois
14  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/publish", publish, false);
15  if (publish)
16  roi_publisher = nh.advertise<cpswarm_msgs::PointArrayEvent>("rois/roi", queue_size, true); // latched
17 
18  // import rois from files
19  from_file();
20 }

22 bool rois::get_all (cpswarm_msgs::GetMultiPoints::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetMultiPoints::Response &res)
23 {
24  // collection of all roi coordinates
25  vector<vector<geometry_msgs::Point>> coords;
26 
27  // maximum number of coordinates of any roi
28  int max_num_coords = 0;
29 
30  // iterate all rois
31  for (auto roi : regions) {
32  // store maximum number of coordinates
33  if (roi.coords[0].size() > max_num_coords)
34  max_num_coords = roi.coords[0].size();
35 
36  // append coordinates
37  coords.push_back(roi.set2vector(roi.coords[0]));
38  }
39 
40  // pad all rois with empty coordinates at the end
41  geometry_msgs::Point empty;
42  for (auto& roi : coords) {
43  for (int i=roi.size(); i<max_num_coords; ++i) {
44  roi.push_back(empty);
45  }
46  }
47 
48  // flatten roi coordinates
49  vector<geometry_msgs::Point> coords_flat;
50  for (auto roi : coords) {
51  coords_flat.insert(coords_flat.end(), roi.begin(), roi.end());
52  }
53 
54  // define multi-array layout
55  vector<std_msgs::MultiArrayDimension> dim;
56 
57  std_msgs::MultiArrayDimension dim0;
58  dim0.label = "roi";
59  dim0.size = coords.size();
60  dim0.stride = coords.size() * max_num_coords;
61  dim.push_back(dim0);
62 
63  std_msgs::MultiArrayDimension dim1;
64  dim1.label = "coords";
65  dim1.size = max_num_coords;
66  dim1.stride = max_num_coords;
67  dim.push_back(dim1);
68 
69  std_msgs::MultiArrayLayout layout;
70  layout.dim = dim;
71  layout.data_offset = 0;
72 
73  // create service response
74  res.layout = layout;
75  res.points = coords_flat;
76 
77  return true;
78 }
79 
80 bool rois::get_closest (cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response &res)
81 {
82  cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response closest;
83  cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response response;
84 
85  for (auto roi : regions) {
86  ROS_DEBUG("Calculate distance to ROI %s", roi.to_string().c_str());
87 
88  if (roi.get_distance(req, response)) {
89  if (closest.closest_line.size() <= 0 || response.distance < closest.distance)
90  closest = response;
91  }
92  else
93  ROS_ERROR("Failed to retrieve distance for ROI %s!", roi.to_string().c_str());
94  }
95 
96  res = closest;
97 
98  return true;
99 }
100 
101 bool rois::get_distance (cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response &res)
102 {
103  cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response closest;
104  cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response response;
105 
106  // find roi according to given coordinates
107  for (auto roi : regions) {
108  // forward request
109  if (roi.coords[0] == roi.vector2set(req.coords)) {
110  roi.get_distance(req, res);
111  return true;
112  }
113  }
114 
115  // create string for warning
116  stringstream coords_ss;
117  for (auto p : req.coords)
118  coords_ss << "(" << p.x << "," << p.y << ") ";
119  ROS_WARN("Could not find ROI %s", coords_ss.str().c_str());
120 
121  return false;
122 }

124 bool rois::get_map (cpswarm_msgs::GetMap::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetMap::Response &res)
125 {
126  // find roi according to given coordinates

131  return true;
132  }
133  }
134 
135  // create string for warning
136  stringstream coords_ss;
137  for (auto p : req.coords)
138  coords_ss << "(" << p.x << "," << p.y << ") ";
139  ROS_WARN("Could not find ROI %s", coords_ss.str().c_str());
140 
141  return false;
142 }

144 bool rois::reload (std_srvs::SetBool::Request& req, std_srvs::SetBool::Response& res)
145 {
146  // reset old rois
147  if (req.data)
148  regions.clear();
149 
150  // import rois from files
151  from_file();
152 
153  res.success = true;
154 
155  return true;
156 }
157 
158 void rois::add_roi (vector<double> x, vector<double> y)
159 {
160  // equal number of x and y coordinates required
161  if (x.size() != y.size()) {
162  ROS_ERROR("Cannot add ROI, number of x and y coordinates do not match (%lu != %lu)", x.size(), y.size());
163  }
164 
165  // not enough coordinates
166  else if (x.size() < 3) {
167  ROS_ERROR("Cannot add ROI, not enough coordinates: %lu", x.size());
168  }
169 
170  else {
171  // add roi
172  roi roi(x, y);
173 
174  // check if roi already exists
175  if (duplicates == false && exists(roi)) {
176  ROS_INFO("Skipped ROI %s, already existing", roi.to_string().c_str());
177  return;
178  }
179 
180  ROS_INFO("Added ROI %s", roi.to_string().c_str());
181  regions.insert(roi);
182 
183  // publish roi
184  if (publish) {
185  cpswarm_msgs::PointArrayEvent event;
186  event.header.stamp = Time::now();
187  event.swarmio.name = "roi";
188  event.x = x;
189  event.y = y;
190  roi_publisher.publish(event);
191  }
192  }
193 }
194 
195 bool rois::exists (roi roi)
196 {
197  // look through all regions
198  for (auto r : regions) {
199  if (r == roi)
200  return true;
201  }
202 
203  // no matching region found
204  return false;
205 }
206 
207 void rois::from_file ()
208 {
209  // directory with roi coodinate files
210  string roi_dir_str = "";
211  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/roi_dir", roi_dir_str, roi_dir_str);
212 
213  // no roi files
214  if (roi_dir_str.empty()) {
215  ROS_INFO("No directory for ROI files given!");
216  return;
217  }
218 
219  // iterate all files in given directory
220  try {
221  // path relative to this ros package
222  filesystem::path package_dir = package::getPath("area_provider");
223  filesystem::path roi_dir = roi_dir_str;
224  filesystem::path roi_dir_abs = package_dir / roi_dir;
225 
226  // iterate all files
227  for(auto const& roi_file : filesystem::directory_iterator{roi_dir_abs}) {
228  string roi_file_name = roi_file.path().filename().string();
229 
230  try {
231  // convert file contents to json object
232  ifstream roi_stream(roi_file.path().string());
233  json roi_json;
234  roi_stream >> roi_json;
235 
236  // invalid plan file
237  if (roi_json.contains("fileType") == false or roi_json["fileType"] != "Plan") {
238  ROS_ERROR("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: not a qGroundControl plan file!", roi_file_name.c_str());
239  continue;
240  }
241  if (roi_json.contains("mission") == false or roi_json["mission"].contains("items") == false or roi_json["mission"]["items"].size() < 3) {
242  ROS_ERROR("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: no mission specified!", roi_file_name.c_str());
243  continue;
244  }
245 
246  // extract coordinates
247  ROS_DEBUG("Extract ROI coordinates from %s...", roi_file_name.c_str());
248  vector<double> x;
249  vector<double> y;
250  for (auto c : roi_json["mission"]["items"]) {
251  if (c["params"].size() < 7) {
252  ROS_ERROR("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: number of params must be 7 for each mission item!", roi_file_name.c_str());
253  break;
254  }
255  if (c["command"] != 16) {
256  ROS_DEBUG("%s: Skipping item (%f,%f), not a waypoint!", roi_file_name.c_str(), double(c["params"][4]), double(c["params"][5]));
257  continue;
258  }
259  x.push_back(c["params"][4]);
260  y.push_back(c["params"][5]);
261  }
262 
263  // create roi object
264  ROS_INFO("Add ROI from file %s...", roi_file_name.c_str());
265  add_roi(x, y);
266  }
267 
268  catch (json::exception &e) {
269  ROS_DEBUG("Skipping file %s, invalid syntax: %s", roi_file_name.c_str(), e.what());
270  }
271 
272  catch (exception &e) {
273  ROS_DEBUG("Skipping file %s: %s", roi_file_name.c_str(), e.what());
274  }
275  }
276  }
277 
278  catch (filesystem::filesystem_error &e) {
279  ROS_ERROR("Cannot read ROI files from %s: %s", roi_dir_str.c_str(), e.what());
280  }
281 
282  if (regions.size() < 1) {
283  ROS_INFO("No ROIs specified in %s!", roi_dir_str.c_str());
284  }
285 }
286 
287 void rois::roi_callback (const cpswarm_msgs::PointArrayEvent::ConstPtr& event)
288 {
289  // create roi object
290  ROS_INFO("Received ROI from swarm member %s", event->swarmio.node.c_str());
291  add_roi(event->x, event->y);
292 }
